articles.title: A Website From Scratch...
articles.subtitle: My take on "coding" a site over "building" one.
articles.body: As I type this, I have been working as a full stack developer for just about seven years now.  Contrary to what you might think given that timespan, the website you are currently reading is the first I've ever created from scratch.
